title: Episode 293: Contested Tastes with Michaela DeSoucey
description: On the season finale of ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined by Michaela DeSoucey, author of Contested Tastes: Foie Gras and the Politics of Food﻿. Bringing together fieldwork, interviews, and materials from archives and the media on both sides of the Atlantic, DeSoucey offers a compelling look at the moral arguments and provocative actions of both pro- and anti-foie gras forces.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
